title: Cursor provenance enforcement bundle for task start/end governance
acceptanceCriteria: Task start hook reviews provenance rules and prior task/risk artifacts
Task start hook creates review, decisions, and risks artifacts for the active task
Task end hook creates a task provenance object with runtime and git metadata
Task end hook validates the task provenance object against JSON Schema draft 2020-12
Open high or critical risks generate a human-review flag artifact
Validation script verifies schema and artifact cross-references
PR check script fails substantive changes with no task provenance artifact updates
Bundle includes setup documentation, workflow, and package scripts
